words.definition: a large card that can be seen by someone (such as an actor) who is performing or speaking on a stage or on television and that shows the words that the person is supposed to say
to agree to become involved in an organized activity
especially in the past, a competition in which young women and girls are judged on their beauty and other qualities
to formally send a document, plan, etc. to a person or group in authority so that they can make a decision about it
to make sure that a business, system, etc. continues to operate, even if it does not make much progress
to collect large amounts of something and keep it for yourself, often in a secret place
a cheap or bad copy of something
